 */import{getMountedApps,navigateToUrl}from'single-spa';// 设置默认路由
export function setDefaultMountApp(defaultAppLink){// can not use addEventListener once option for ie support
window.addEventListener('single-spa:no-app-change',function listener(){var mountedApps=getMountedApps();if(!mountedApps.length){navigateToUrl(defaultAppLink);}window.removeEventListener('single-spa:no-app-change',listener);});}
